page.title: 11Relaxing In Nantwich.
page.content: Although the majority of people work out of the town, many do use the local leisure facilities.Two{swimming {pools,}two parks and a number of local clubs and societies are all well supported. In the town centre is a small theatre as well as a library,civic hall and small museum.The{Barony Park has facilities for rugby,football, tennis and bowls as well as play areas for children.Local schools have sports facilities that are used by the community during the evenings and weekends. The{river Weaver and Shropshire {Union Canal}are used for recreation by local people and tourists.Sailing, holidaying on a barge and fishing are all popular.{Stapely Water Gardens}are the largest in Europe and attract both local customers and visiting tourists.
